channel.title: CVE Feed for Jeff Starr -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jeff Starr -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-25601|2024-08-03T04:42:50.353Z -- jeff%20starr -- contact%20form%20x%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability affecting parameter &tab discovered in Contact Form X WordPress plugin (versions <= 2.4).

item.title: CVE-2022-25610|2024-08-03T04:42:50.291Z -- jeff%20starr -- simple%20ajax%20chat%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Unauthenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Simple Ajax Chat <= 20220115 allows an attacker to store the malicious code. However, the attack requires specific conditions, making it hard to exploit.

item.title: CVE-2022-27849|2024-08-03T05:41:09.918Z -- jeff%20starr -- simple%20ajax%20chat%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Sensitive Information Disclosure (sac-export.csv) in Simple Ajax Chat (WordPress plugin) <= 20220115

item.title: CVE-2022-27850|2024-08-03T05:41:10.128Z -- jeff%20starr -- simple%20ajax%20chat%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) in Simple Ajax Chat (WordPress plugin) <= 20220115 allows an attacker to clear the chat log or delete a chat message.

item.title: CVE-2023-7251|2024-08-02T08:57:35.194Z -- jeff%20starr -- user%20submitted%20posts
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jeff Starr User Submitted Posts allows Stored XSS.This issue affects User Submitted Posts: from n/a through 20230901.

item.title: CVE-2023-7251|2024-03-26T08:40:39.209Z -- jeff%20starr -- user%20submitted%20posts
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jeff Starr User Submitted Posts allows Stored XSS.This issue affects User Submitted Posts: from n/a through 20230901.
